Name: Ratio of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences to total occurrences of all \SW-Awaiting*\ activities (e.g., SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion, SW-Awaiting AE Assignment, SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Number of times SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurs across all cases
Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision being directly preceded by SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences that are followed by SW-EIC Major Revision compared to those followed by SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Number of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision instances that occur after at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed activity in the same case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing SW-Reviewer Agreed that eventually reach SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision appearing in variants with performance duration above the median variant duration
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences that are not immediately followed by any further activity (i.e., potential stalled decisions)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences to total occurrences of all SW-Awaiting* activities (e.g., SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion, SW-Awaiting AE Assignment, SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Number of distinct cases in which SW-Awaiting EIC Decision appears more than once
Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision steps that occur within 30 days of the first SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision being part of a variant that includes multiple rounds of revision (e.g., RW-* or RSW-* activities)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Average number of activities occurring between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision across all cases where both appear in sequence
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Percentage of variants that include SW-Awaiting EIC Decision as a step before a final editorial decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision, SW-EIC Minor Revision, or SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences that lead to a rejection-type outcome (SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit) versus acceptance or revision outcomes
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-EIC Reject' out of all cases
